ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour,   +   3/4 cup white sugar,   +   3/4 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/4 teaspoon fine salt,   +   3/4 cup frozen unsalted butter, 2 large egg yolks, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar, or as needed
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 11g 57%, Cholesterol 97mg 32%, Sodium 124mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 58g 21%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 10mg 52%, Calcium 51mg 4%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 114mg 2%
